com.cloudera.data.MetadataProvider

Packages that use MetadataProvider
com.cloudera.data.filesystem Provides a dataset implementation for Hadoop filesystems, like HDFS. 
 

Uses of MetadataProvider in com.cloudera.data.filesystem
 

Classes in com.cloudera.data.filesystem that implement MetadataProvider
 class FileSystemMetadataProvider
           A MetadataProvider that stores dataset metadata in a Hadoop FileSystem.

Methods in com.cloudera.data.filesystem with parameters of type MetadataProvider

Constructors in com.cloudera.data.filesystem with parameters of type MetadataProvider
FileSystemDatasetRepository(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fileSystem, org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path rootDirectory, MetadataProvider metadataProvider)
          Construct a FileSystemDatasetRepository on the given FileSystem and root directory, with the given MetadataProvider for metadata storage.
